about_the_game:
Legend has it that 10,000 stairs lead to the Temple of Heaven, built on top of a vast rock above the cloud line. The top of the stairs and the temple are connected by a bridge, protected by dragons who prevent the unworthy from passing. The church provides space for believers, for those who want to meditate or wish to practice and learn magical doctrines. It is said that those who reach the sanctuary are allowed to ask a single question from the gods themselves, and receive and accurate answer.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

name: RPGScenery - Sky Temple Scene

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
